section.name: DataNucleus AccessPlatform 3.1.5 Released
section.p: May 23rd 2013- DataNucleus AccessPlatform 3.1.5 ("Kepler") is released. DataNucleus AccessPlatform provides persistence and retrieval of Java objects to/from a wide range of datastores including RDBMS, Neo4j, MongoDB, LDAP, XML, and Excel. Version 3.1.5 includes the following changes over 3.1.4

ul.li: JDO : Fix to Localiser creation to avoid problem under OSGi
RDBMS : Fix to SQL query execution to avoid connection close problem
RDBMS : Fix to pessimistic locking for SQLServer

section.p: This release is downloadable under an Apache 2 license from the DataNucleus community site.
